full_summary:
Government Tender Announcement
================================

### Tender Information

* **Tender Reference**: M7594-231465_A Request for Proposal (RFP)
* **Publication Date**: 2023-02-01
* **Tender Closing Date**: 2023-02-17 14:00:00 EST

### Solicitation Summary

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) solicits supply services from qualified suppliers for the provision of kiln-dried wood shavings. This RFP requires the delivery of softwood wood shavings to Pakenham Breeding Farm and Ottawa Stable on an "as and when requested" basis.

### Key Details

* **Contract Duration**: Three (3) years, with two contracts to be awarded
* **Delivery Regions**: National Capital Region (NCR)
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Responsive Bid per destination
* **Notice Type**: Request for Proposal (RFP)
* **Trade Agreements**: This tender is covered by the Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA), Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA), Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), and Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)

### Contact Information

* **Contact Name**: Jackson Hiltz (SPAC/PSPC)
* **Contact Email**: [jackson.hiltz@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:jackson.hiltz@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* **Notice URL**: [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15278576?extsite=MTUyNzg1NzZfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15278576?extsite=MTUyNzg1NzZfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==) 

### Important Note

* The deadline for response has been amended to 2023-02-
